name: Offroad Chasing -Drifting Game
description:
Play the fastest speed on all kinds of extreme tracks and control the direction

Drift at the limit of the curve, surpassing all other opponents

A wonderful counterattack from the last one to the first place!

Game features:
Beautiful game scene:
The next generation of picture style, exquisite racing model, the most realistic game track, the most realistic physics engine, bring you the most realistic 3D drift racing!

A variety of racing modes:
The game has a variety of racing cars, a variety of styles, cool tails, colorful skin, so that racing enthusiasts can not put it down!
More configuration upgrades, to create exclusive off-road vehicles!

Cool appearance animation, the most realistic drift experience, exquisite collision experience, and perfect sound effects, let you immerse yourself in the galloping car!

The new physics engine, 3D quality brings a more exciting driving experience, more perfect visual experience, and run wild!

Are you ready to experience the real competitive racing game?

Can you resist the speed call to you?
